characters.name: guard
characters.description: The guard is about 180cm tall.  He is wearing a red uniform.

places.description: You are in a room with blue walls.  There is a green door in the north wall, a yellow door in the western wall and a cupboard door in the eastern wall. There is a Persian rug on the floor.
You are in a store cupboard.  There are some shelves in the cupboard. There is a cupboard door to the west going back to the room.
You are in a small room with a narrow, sloping roof. There is a rocking chair in the room and a bare bed up against one of the walls.  There is a green door in the southern wall.
You are in a long, empty corridor.  There is a yellow door in the eastern wall and a room at the western end of the corridor.

You are in a guardroom.  There is a metal silver door leading to a jail cell in the southern wall, there is a gold metal door leading to a jail cell in the northern wall.  There is a clear desk with a chair behind it.  Sitting in the chair is a guard.  There is a corridor going eastwards.
You are in a jail cell.  To the south there is a gold door.
You are in a jail cell.  There is a skeleton in the corner.  To the north there is a silver door.
You are in a cellar.  There is a ladder going up.  There is a shelf going around the wall and a barrel on the floor.

items.description: It is a green door
items.name: green door

items.description: It is a green door
items.name: green door

items.description: It is a yellow door
items.name: yellow door

items.description: It is a yellow door
items.name: yellow door

items.description: It is a cupboard door
items.name: cupboard door

items.description: It is a cupboard door
items.name: cupboard door

items.description: It is a large colourful rug
items.name: rug
items.results: say,You can see a trapdoor underneath;say,You can't get that it is too big

items.description: It is a trapdoor.  There is a ringpull that can be used to open it.
items.name: trapdoor

items.description: It is a trapdoor.  There is a ringpull that can be used to open it.
items.name: trapdoor

items.description: It is a wooden rocking chair.  It looks comfortable.
items.name: rocking chair
items.results: say,Hmmm that is a comfortable chair;say,You can't do that it is attached to the floor;say,You can't get that it is too big

items.description: It is a bed. There are no sheets or blankets on it but other than that it looks like the one you have at home.
items.name: bed
items.results: say,You wake up feeling refreshed and ready to go;say,You can't do that it is attached to the floor

items.description: There is a set of shelves.
items.name: shelves
items.results: say,You can't do that they are attached to the floor

items.description: The book is badly water-damaged.  Only one page is readable.
items.name: book
items.results: say,The guard likes to play games of chance. If you lose he will take something you own but if you win you can take something that he owns. To play a dice game with him use the command 'playdice guard'.  If you have more than one die he won't let you choose which one you use.

items.description: It is the flag that you have been looking for.
items.name: flag

items.description: It is a human skeleton, they are definitely dead.
items.name: skeleton
items.results: say,You decide you don't want to do that;say,The skeleton is now in a different place in the cell

items.description: It is a chair, there is nothing special about it.  The guard seems to think it is a bit strange that you are staring at his chair.
items.name: chair
items.results: say,You can't do that there is someone sitting on it;use,The guard won't let you sit on his lap

items.description: It is a plain desk.
items.name: desk
items.results: say,You can't do that it is bolted to the floor

items.description: It is an empty plastic flask.
items.name: flask

items.description: It is a barrel containing water.
items.name: barrel
items.results: say,It is too heavy to pick up;say,It is too heavy to move

items.description: It is a dusty shelf.
items.name: shelf
items.results: say,It is attached to the wall

items.description: It is a black die.  It is an adjustable weighted die - before rolling you can adjust a weight so that you can choose within which range a number will be rolled.
items.name: black die

items.description: It is an apple.  It looks tasty.
items.name: apple

items.description: It is an empty glass jar.  The lid is missing.
items.name: jar

items.description: It is a battery-operated torch.
items.name: torch
items.results: say,It is easier to see now

items.description: It is a truncheon, it looks dangerous.
items.name: truncheon

items.description: It is a gold metal key.
items.name: gold key

items.description: It is a gold metal door.
items.name: gold door

items.description: It is a gold metal door.  There is a guard room on the otherside of the door.
items.name: gold door

items.description: It is a silver metal key.
items.name: silver key

items.description: It is a silver metal door with bars on it.  There are some bones on the floor in the jail cell the door leads to.
items.name: silver door

items.description: It is a silver metal door with bars on it.  There is a guard room on the otherside of the door.
items.name: silver door

items.description: It is a red die, it is weighted.
items.name: red die

items.description: It is a blue die.
items.name: blue die
